purpose: Central registry for data folder schemas and versions. Agents should read this first.

benchmarks.description: Market indices P/E, P/B, ROE - 15+ years history

damodaran.description: Industry valuation data, ERP, credit ratings

global-scouter.description: Stock screening (1,240), ETFs (23), indicators (1,048) + extended: eps_consensus, growth_consensus, per_bands

indices.description: S&P 500 and NASDAQ daily price history (1980-present, 46 years)

sec-13f.description: Institutional holdings from 30 major investors (20Q accumulate, analytics)

recent_changes.change: Major update: 17→30 investors, 20Q accumulate mode, analytics/ folder (consensus, new_positions, buying_pressure, conviction)
Data refresh (2026-02-13 source): 1,239 stocks (-1), 1,048 indicators, per_bands 95.8%
Data refresh (2026-02-06 source): 1,240 stocks (-1), 1,048 indicators (+1), per_bands 95.8%
Weekly data update: 829 data points (2010-03-19 ~ 2026-01-30), summaries 37 sections
Synced manifest dates with actual file timestamps (sentiment, indices, benchmarks, slickcharts → 01-26)
Extended fields: fiscal_month (100%), eps_consensus (100%), growth_consensus (100%), per_bands (95.7%)
Documentation correction: LEGACY->ACTIVE, manual->daily, fixed schema to match actual data structure (price time series, not constituents)
summaries.json added with momentum and yearly returns
516 individual stock files in stocks/ subfolder

agent_instructions.on_session_start: Read this manifest to understand current data structure
agent_instructions.on_schema_change: Update folder schema.json AND this manifest recent_changes
agent_instructions.on_new_file: Add to folder schema.json files section
